channel.title: systems medicine on Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content in systems medicine on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.title: DIGGER
item.description: Analyze protein-protein and domain-domain interactions in a joint graph.

item.title: Exploring the SARS-CoV-2 virus-host-drug interactome for drug repurposing
Computational Strategies to Combat COVID-19: Useful Tools to Accelerate SARS-CoV-2 and Coronavirus Research
Mechanistic Modeling and Multiscale Applications for Precision Medicine: Theory and Practice
The fight against COVID-19
item.description: The CoVex systems medicine platform allows identifying putative drug targets and drug repurposing candidates to treat COVID-19.

item.title: CoVex
item.description: A web app for mining the Sars-COV-<sup>1</sup>⁄<sub>2</sub> virus-host-drug interactome for drug repurposing candidates.

item.title: BiCoN: Network-constrained biclustering of patients and omics data
BiCoN
item.description: A python package and web application for network-constrained biclustering for patient stratification.

item.title: immunedeconv
item.description: An R package for running several tools for in silico cell type deconvolution for immuno-oncology.

item.title: KPM
item.description: A web app for de novo network enrichment, i.e. to integrate multi-omics data with the interactome.

item.title: HiTSeekR
item.description: An R shiny web application for the analysis of various types of high-throughput screening data.

item.title: REPO-TRIAL
item.description: The EU H2020 project REPO-TRIAL aims at developing an in silico approach to optimise the efficacy and precision of drug repurposing trials. To this end we integrated heterogeneous data into a comprehensive interactome of disease-drug-gene interactions (a new diseasome).
